== Fields

=== `operator`

The operation to perform on messages.

*Type*: `string`

[cols="1m,2a"]
|===
|Option |Summary

|from_json
|Convert JSON messages to MessagePack format

|to_json
|Convert MessagePack messages to JSON format

|===
